alertMessages.changePassContent: Type old password, new password and confirm
alertMessages.emailToShareThing: Insert recipient user's email for share thing
alertMessages.userIdMustBe4Min: Error on user id, must be min 4 characters
alertMessages.passMustBe7Min: Error on password, must be min 7 characters
alertMessages.nameMustBe2Min: Error on name, must be min 2 characters
alertMessages.lastNameMustBe2Min: Error on last name, must be min 2 characters
alertMessages.phoneMustBe5Min: Error on phone, must be min 5 characters
alertMessages.newPasswordSentToEmail: A new password was sent to your email
alertMessages.errorUnsharingThing: Error while unsharing thing, try again later
alertMessages.errorSharingThing: Error while sharing thing, try again later
alertMessages.errorUpdatingUser: Error updating user, try again later
alertMessages.passChanged: Password changed, login again with new password
alertMessages.errorOnFormVerifyFields: You have an error on form, please, verify fields
alertMessages.errorOnFormVerifyFormat: You have an error on form, please, verify fields format
alertMessages.errorOnFormVerifyMissingFields: You have an error on form, please, missing fields
alertMessages.errorOnFormTryAgain: You have an error on form, please, verify and try again
alertMessages.selectRuleBeforeSave: Select rule first and before save
alertMessages.selectActionForScheduled: Select an action for scheduled, this can be thing fire or rule validation
alertMessages.errorScheduledRegex: Error on scheduled expression, review and try again
alertMessages.selectBasicOrAdvanced: Select an scheduled Basic or Advanced
alertMessages.failSave: Error while saving changes, try again
alertMessages.sessionError: For security reasons you need login again because your session is expired
alertMessages.offlineError: You are offline, connect to a network and try again
alertMessages.updatePropertiesError: Error while updating properties, try again

step1.header: Go to your wifi list and connect to a network like 'RAMPIOTXXXXXX'
step1.connected: You are connected to $SSID, press next to continue with the thing registration.

step2.header: Fill form data for finish thing registration
step2.name: Name

step3.header: Thing register completed !!, reconnect to your wifi or mobile network and wait while thing connects to rampiot services.
step3.subHeader: If your thing not appear on App, and you wants reconfigure again, you need press the thing reset button for a few seconds.

share.notFound: Thing not shared, start sharing thing clicking in '+New' button

rules.rulesNotFound: Rules not found, start creating a rule clicking in '+New' button
